problems.title: Alien Dictionary
problems.description:
Problem Statement

Given a sorted dictionary of an alien language having N words and k starting alphabets of standard dictionary. Find the order of characters in the alien language.
Note: Many orders may be possible for the same test case, thus you may return any valid order.

Return the string of characters in order.
problems.examples:
Sample Input
5 4
baa
abcd
abca
cab
cad

Sample Output
b d a c

Explanation:
From baa and abcd, we get b < a.
From abcd and abca, we get d < a.
From abca and cab, we get a < c.
From cab and cad, we get b < d.
So b < d < a < c.
hintsList: Build a graph where edge u->v means u comes before v.
